amendment.description: To improve the authorities relating to major automated information system programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4281 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4281 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5933-5934) To improve the authorities relating to major automated information system programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4281 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
